TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewImageColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 承载一个 对象集合。

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特殊的类型的类用于对逻辑上承载的单元格显示图像。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that display images. A都有一个相关中每个与其相交。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每个单元格是否能够包含或，具体的值取决于属性。Each cell is capable of containing an or an , depending on the value of the property. 显示图标可用于容纳图像的透明度。Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency. 默认情况下，空单元格显示默认错误图形。By default, empty cells display a default error graphic. 若要防止此图显示的单元格的值等于`null`或，将其设置的单元格样式对象的属性返回的属性`null`之前将行添加到控件。To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or , set the property of the cell style object returned by the property to `null` before adding rows to the control. 但是这不影响用于新纪录的行。This does not affect the row for new records, however. 若要防止错误图形的行中显示新的记录时控件属性值是`true`，还必须请显式将单元格的值设置为`null`控件处理程序中事件或一组列指向的实例的属性-派生类型与被重写返回的属性`null`。To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control event or set the column property to an instance of a -derived type with an overridden property that returns `null`. 此列类型的默认排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用映像来创建 TicTacToe 游戏。The following code example demonstrates how to use images to create a TicTacToe game. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#0)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool valuesAreIcons) cil managed

param.name: valuesAreIcons
param.span: 以指示此列单元格的 属性将被设置为类型 的值； 以指示它们将被设置为类型 的值。

span.span: to indicate that the property of cells in this column will be set to values of type ; to indicate that they will be set to values of type .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，可以选择配置它以用于 单元格值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, optionally configuring it for use with cell values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化通过设置以下属性的列。This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||一个新与其属性初始化为`valuesAreIcons`参数值。A new with its property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| ||`valuesAreIcons` 参数的值。The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| |属性返回对象属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|| |属性返回对象属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|类型的标准错误图形如果`valuesAreIcons`是`true`和类型如果`valuesAreIcons`是`false`。A standard error graphic of type if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| 若要确保的 alpha 通道正确绘制单元格的值，请使用此构造函数用于`valuesAreIcons`的参数值`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell CellTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property CellTemplate As DataGridViewCell
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ CellTemplate { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类初始化该属性为新创建。The constructors for the class initialize this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列的现有单元格的用户的界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

exception.span: 所设置的类型与类型 不兼容。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this column.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以复制的单元格一列。Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides Property DefaultCellStyle As DataGridViewCellStyle

public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ DefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值返回此属性具有以下的初始属性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 属性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|默认值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| ||| ||类型的标准错误图形如果初始属性值是`true`; 否则为类型的标准错误图形。A standard error graphic of type if the initial property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type .| 这些值重写中指定的值属性控件，但可能由其他单元格样式属性重写。These values override the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免出现的标准错误图形`null`或单元格值，设置到此单元格样式对象的属性`null`或你自己错误图形之前将行添加到控件。To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or cell values, set the property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control. 但是这不影响用于新纪录的行。This does not affect the row for new records, however. 若要防止错误图形的行中显示新的记录时控件属性值是`true`，还必须请显式将单元格的值设置为`null`或你自己的处理程序控制中的错误图形事件，或者设置列指向的实例的属性-派生类型与被重写返回的属性`null`或你自己错误图形。To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control event or set the column property to an instance of a -derived type with an overridden property that returns `null` or your own error graphic. 如果属性返回的对象属性具有值等于类型的标准错误图形、 变化属性值设置为`true`自动设置到类型的标准错误图形。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . 如果具有的值等于类型的标准错误图形、 变化属性值设置为`false`自动设置类型与标准错误图形。If has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置描述列图像的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
The textual description of the column image.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来描述提供的映像或属性。You can use the property to describe the image provided by the or property. 此说明提供了另一种可到映像。This description provides an accessible alternative to the image. 此外，单元格的值复制到剪贴板时，要使用的说明文本。Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置的列中每个单元格的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以反映的图像布局。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to reflect the image layout. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

span.span: The value of the property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Icon ^ Icon { System::Drawing::Icon ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Icon ^ value); };

summary.span: 当没有设置单元格的 属性，而且单元格的 属性被设置为 时，获取或设置在此列的单元格中显示的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's property is not set and the cell's property is set to .
The to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在不含任何值时列不是数据绑定的单元格和单元格的显示图标属性设置为`true`。The property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's property is set to `true`. 对于其单元格不具有关联的图像的数据绑定列，将显示标准错误图形。For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed. 使用属性而不是属性可确保正确绘制 alpha 通道中一个图标。Using the property rather than the property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly. 如果你想要显示而不是，将其设置属性改为设置和属性`false`。If you want to display an instead of an , set the property instead and set the property to `false`. 你还可以设置属性的各个单元格以指示该单元格是否显示或属性值。You can also set the property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the or the property value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Image ^ Image { System::Drawing::Image ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Image ^ value); };

summary.span: 当没有设置单元格的 属性，而且单元格的 属性被设置为 时，获取或设置在此列的单元格中显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's property is not set and the cell's property is set to .
The to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在不含任何值时列不是数据绑定的单元格和单元格的显示的图像属性设置为`false`。The property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's property is set to `false`. 对于其单元格不具有关联的图像的数据绑定列，将显示标准错误图形。For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed. 如果你想要显示而不是，将其设置属性改为设置和属性`true`。If you want to display an instead of an , set the property instead and set the property to `true`. 这样可确保的 alpha 通道正确绘制。This ensures that the alpha channel of the is painted correctly. 你还可以设置属性的各个单元格以指示该单元格是否显示或时没有单元格值的属性值。You can also set the property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the or the property value when there is no cell value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置默认图像。The following code example demonstrates how to set the default image. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout ImageLayout { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此列的单元格中的图像布局。

span.span: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
A that specifies the cell layout.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何拉伸和缩放图像以适合单元格。The following code example demonstrates how to stretch and zoom images to fit cells. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

value.span: 如果单元格显示类型 的值，则为 ；如果单元格显示类型 的值，则为 。

span.span: if cells display values of type ; if cells display values of type .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确保的 alpha 通道正确绘制值，将此属性设置为`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 如果属性返回的对象属性具有值等于类型的标准错误图形、 变化属性值设置为`true`自动设置到类型的标准错误图形。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . 如果具有的值等于类型的标准错误图形、 变化属性值设置为`false`自动设置类型与标准错误图形。If has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type .

span.span: The value of the property is .
